data.author: Bert de Ruiter

changelog.release_notes: Changed weather update function to try and eliminate new weather API restrictions.

Updated to use the new OpenWeatherMap API.
Weather update is now every hour, due to limitations of the new API changes.
Removed leaderboard completely, I cannot afford the hosting for it anymore because there are too many users right now.

Fixed weather not showing.
Fixed temperature not saving.
Added color selection, choose any color you want!
Leaderboard temporary unavailable (it will be back soon)
Stopped bgworker till I fix the SDK 3 bug.
Added fixed locations to avoid using GPS.
Pip Boy 100 color Pebble Time release
Added an option to disable the backgroundworker.

Added a background worker.
Now you also get xp when you're using a different watchface!
Background worker updates once every minute, this should not have a major impact on the battery.
Fixed a bug where the nickname would not be saved.

Added configuration screen to select fahrenheit or celcius.
Temperature now has 1 decimal.

Added leaderboards!
Enter a nickname in the settings menu and compete with other Vault Dwellers for the top!

The leaderboards is currently in an early stage, more to come!

data.description: A Pebble watchface inspired by Fallout’s Pip Boy. - Date (European/US) - Battery charge Middle “VaultBoy” shows bluetooth connection. When the connection changes the Pebble will vibrate. With certain movements you will gain experience points and you can level up! Shake your Pebble to show the weather.

latest_release.release_notes: Changed weather update function to try and eliminate new weather API restrictions.

data.title: Pip Boy 100
